description:
Create snippets of text for support responses, sales outreach, or even common emails and save them in TextExpander.


What's new in TextExpander 7.8
- Improves discoverability of New Snippet button
- Easier creation and editing of Rich Text snippets
- Adds hint for inline search
- Easier access to team creation and management
- Improved placement of Fill In & Inline Search
- Various fixes and improvements
